<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Plant Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=338) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 138 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2) or [Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

You can take the form of a plant creature. Add the forms listed in [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223) to your [wild shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316) list; if you don't have _wild shape_, you can instead cast _plant form_ once per day, heightened to the same level as your highest-level druid spell slot. Whenever you're polymorphed into another form using _wild shape_, you gain resistance 5 to poison.

<title level="2">Plant Shape leads to...</title>
[Reactive Transformation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1718)
name: Plant Shape
